step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Remember to place your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
You're placing your hands correctly. Focus on keeping your body relaxed at this stage before the inhale.
Great inhale! Try to tighten your whole body muscles a bit more and visualize the fluid moving to your chest.
Nice exhale and relaxation. Keep visualizing pushing the fluid out as you breathe out.
Good start for the second rep. Remember to place your hands on your abdomen and prepare for the inhale.
Hands are in place. Focus on a slow inhale and remember to tighten your whole body muscles.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening! Visualize the lymph fluid moving towards your chest.
Well done relaxing and exhaling. Continue to visualize pushing fluid out as you complete this breath.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tightening your whole body, and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Keep practicing this to help with lymphatic drainage and healing.
